manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We take pride in manufacturing the highest quality dash cam adapters. Unlike other adapters that involve hiding and wrapping wires around your car (or worse – leaving them dangling across your windshield), Dongar adapters plug directly into your rearview mirror, ensuring a hassle-free setup and distraction-free driving for you.

Install as easy as 1...2...3 Check your compatibility Before ordering, confirm your vehicle's compatibility by using our compatibility chart. Plug in the adapter Installation is simple! With your vehicle turned off, simply unplug the power source from your rearview mirror and replace it with the Dongar Dash Cam Power Adapter. To do this you can depress the plastic push tabs on the connector and unplug it from the mirror. Dual power design Once your adapter is connected to your mirror, plug both your Dash Cam and original power source into the adapter. Our dual power design provides power to both your dash cam and your mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with 2021 Lincoln Nautilus
reviews.reviewText: Genius idea.This wiring harness works perfectly with 2021 Lincoln Nautilus. It took 20 minutes to install and most of that is routing the cables so the tabs on the cover fit without pinching the wires. The install video here on Amazon is perfect, It all works flawlessly. I would highly recommend if you have an auto dimming mirror in your car. Wish I could do this to the other car but it doesn't have auto dimming power mirror. Saves you from having to route the dashcam wires all over to get to the 12v plug.Ford makes most of their 12volt plugs have constant power, so if you forget to unplug dashcam in every time, it stays on and drains your battery. With this adapter you don't have to worry about remembering to plug or unplug your dashcam. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An absolute must for adding a dashcam to a Ford Explorer
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to add a dashcam to the wife's 2020 Ford Explorer ST. I wanted a very clean install with minimal wires showing. This pigtail was definetly the ticket to a successful job. I pulled down the panel located above the mirror by pulling straight down. Unplugged the mirror connector and installed this pigtail inline. I did use a dremel to enlarge the small notch that the mirror wire exits from so my wires exit through the same hole. The pigtail did exactly as advertised, was small enough to fit inside the cover/trim, and was easy to install. What more would you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly on bronco sport
reviews.reviewText: Worked like a charm on my bronco sport wildtrak edition, I am powering a dashcam from it. The only bad thing is that when auto start/stop is enabled, whenever the car starts again, the cam reboots.

reviews.reviewerName: this is not a spray bottle, can't be used.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work with mach e.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly in my 2023 Escale
reviews.reviewText: Installed on a 2023 Ford Escape ST-Line Elite. Installation was very straight forward and simple. Can gets power when the car is running and turns off when you shut the car off. Perfect solution and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Make installing a DashCam really easy to install. Literally took 5 min to connect it to the rear view mirror and the short wires (USB-C & mini USB) make for a very clean install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t allow for proper fit if factory cover
reviews.reviewText: Works as it’s intended to, but it doesn’t allow the factory cover to fit back flush to the windshield. No matter what the routing, you have to have the power wire to the camera run outside of the cover. The Mach e doesn’t have a proper cut out to allow for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the Job Done with Some Minor Quirks
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this product, and it certainly serves its intended purpose well, with a few noteworthy aspects to consider.Pros:- This product does precisely what it's meant to do, providing a practical solution for managing your cables and keeping them organized.- It comes with three different types of USB cables, which is a nice bonus, ensuring compatibility with a variety of devices.- The inclusion of sticky clips for securing loose wires is a thoughtful touch, helping to maintain a tidy and clutter-free workspace.Cons:- One minor drawback is that the adapter could be a bit shorter. A shorter adapter would result in a neater and more compact fit inside the housing, enhancing the overall aesthetics of the setup.In summary, this product is a reliable cable management solution that does its job effectively. The inclusion of multiple USB cables and sticky clips adds value to the package. While there's room for improvement with the adapter length for a cleaner look, it's a practical addition to any workspace or home setup.
Easy to install in 15min. Came with all the pieces, clips and cables I needed. Very clean install. Works and looks great. Installed in Mustang Mach-E GT.

Da mein Mustang Mach-E geleased ist wollte ich auf der einen Seite auf jeden Fall eine Dashcam - auf der anderen Seite möglichst wenig am KFZ selbst verändern und auch keine Unsummen an eine Werkstatt zum Einbau eines Hardwire Kits ausgeben.Für den Einbau dieses Adapters gibt es ein super Video bei Youtube, ist innerhalb von 15 Minuten auch selbst geschafft.Es liegen 3 kurze Adapterkabel auf USB-C, Micro-USB und Mini-USB bei.Dashcam funktioniert einwandfrei und das Ergebnis ist super clean.Preis in Deutschland durch Import / hohe Versandkosten leider etwas höher als in den USA, aber allemal sein Geld wert!
Installed on a 2023 Ford Edge . Worked as intended

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice product, won’t record in parked mode for dash cam
reviews.reviewText: Because this only supplies power when the car is turned in, you can’t use the parked mode function of your camera. IE if someone hits your car while it’s parked, it won’t start recording. For that function you need a special hardwire kit.
